Description:
Sketchware pro fix9 :
1: fix fragment bugs.
2: fix Lottie blocks.
3: impove ViewPager.
4: StringBuilder component has been removed, and replaced with AsyncTask component.
5: add more built-in blocks.
6: improve blocks manager.
7: arrange components blocks.
8: change viewEditor frame.
9: now you can add independent class/method to components.
Name: Sketchware Pro fix9

Description:
1: YouTubePlayerView fixed.
2: Added new blocks for YouTubePlayerView.
3: added few new blocks.
3: now you can add custom permissions in AndroidManifest Manager.
4: added new option (Local libraries) in Developers tools.
5: swipe refresh event added.
6: moreBlock is no longer private, so you can access Fragments methods from main activity.
7: (add custom import) removed from logic editor (use import event instead).
8: blocks improved 
9: bugs fixes.
Name: Sketchware Pro fix8

Description:
This was made app for getting direct link from play store so you can download them with external downloader app such as ADM

Main features :
Easy to use
Lightweight
Clean simple UI
No useless permissions
Name: Apk Link

Description:
XML Editor Pro is a tool for your sketchware project

XML Editor Pro is a tools that allow Sketchware user to add more java and XML file to their project and also its allow to edit and write exist file

1, - Add More Library
2, - Edit existing library
2, - Manifest Management
And more
Name: Xml Editor Pro

Description:
This tool is to manage sketchware revolution blocks by adding new ones and edit categories.

- Manage Sketchware Revolution blocks.
- Manage categories.
- Add new blocks.
Name: Block Manager

Description: Java Library holds 300 more java code samples, 100 more for top level code, and various other application samples, all of which you can use on android studio, android sketchware, and so on ...
Name: Java library beta

Description:
Convert android.support code into androidx code, or you can do the opposite.

This app is especially for Android Developers who use Mobile Android IDEs like Sketchware.

Using this app you can easily migrate from the old support library packages to the new androidx packages. Or you can also back to the support library.
Name: androidx code converter

Description: This tool helps you to hide your string as a security defense.
Name: Obfuscator

Description:
This is the best Sketchware Revolution tool ever made, you will discover how awesome it is after downloading it.

- Add new libraries.
- Edit project source code.
- Edit project data.
- Edit layouts.
- Add import.
- Project backup.
- Shared moreblocks.
- Shared Java codes.
- Shared icons.
Name: Manager
